subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets prolonged the Pittsburgh Pirates’ swoon Monday night with a 6-2 victory that featured a solid performance by Jenrry Mejia and two home runs by Ike Davis.
snippet: The Mets prolonged the Pittsburgh Pirates’ swoon Monday night with a 6-2 victory that featured a solid performance by Jenrry Mejia and two home runs by Ike Davis.
